Title: Figure style editing
Description: This feature enables users to manage various style properties of SVG figures, including fill color, fill opacity, line color, line width, and line opacity. This comprehensive control over style properties allows for detailed customization of SVG graphics, enhancing the user experience.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Change fill colors
Description: As a user, I want to change the fill color of a figure, so that I can customize the appearance of my SVG graphics according to my design needs.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Change fill Opacity
Description: As a user, I want to adjust the fill opacity of a figure, so that I can create layered visual effects and manage the transparency of elements within my SVG graphics.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Menu option for new image
Description: As a user, I want to be able to create a new empty image from the menu application so that I can start working on a blank canvas
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Change line color
Description: As a user, I want to change the line color of a figure, so that I can distinguish different elements within my SVG graphics and align them with my design theme.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Change line width
Description: As a user, I want to adjust the line width of a figure, so that I can emphasize or de-emphasize certain elements within my SVG graphics, contributing to the overall composition.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Change line opacity
Description: As a user, I want to adjust the line opacity of a figure, so that I can control the visibility of lines in my SVG graphics, enabling more nuanced design decisions.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Menu option for saving an image
Description: As a user, I want to be able to save an image in its current state so that I can continue working on it later.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Menu option for opening a SVG file
Description: As a user, I want to be able to open SVG files in the application so that I can edit them.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Create a rectangle
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a rectangle to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Menu option for undo the last operation
Description: As a user, I want to be able to undo the last operation so that I can revert changes if needed.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Create a circle
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a circle to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Menu option for exit
Description: As a user, I want a menu option to exit the application so that I can close it when I'm done.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Figure selection manipulation
Description: This feature encompasses the functionalities related to the selection, movement, visual indication of selection, removal of figures and multi-figure selection within the SVG Editor. It aims to provide users with intuitive and efficient ways to interact with figures in their SVG projects.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Create a line
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a line to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Selecting figures
Description: As a user, I want to select figures by left-clicking on them, so that I can easily identify and choose specific elements within my SVG project for further actions.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Moving figures
Description: As a user, I want to move selected figures either by using the keyboard arrows or by dragging and dropping with the mouse, so that I can precisely position elements within my SVG project.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Displaying selected figures
Description: As a user, I want the application to visually indicate which figures are selected, so that I can clearly see which elements are currently active for manipulation or editing.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Create a ellipse
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a ellipse to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Removing selected figures
Description: As a user, I want to remove selected figures from my SVG project, so that I can easily delete unwanted elements and refine my design.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Create a polyline
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a polyline to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Undo functionality for all operations
Description: This functionality should allow users to undo all types of operations performed in the application
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Create a polygon
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a polygon to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Create a path
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a path to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Undo functionality for figure manipulation operations
Description: As a user, I want to be able to undo figure manipulation operations so that I can revert changes made to figures.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Undo functionality for style changes
Description: As a user, I want to be able to undo style changes so that I can revert changes made to figure styles.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Undo functionality for group actions
Description: As a user, I want to be able to undo group actions so that I can revert changes made to grouped figures.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Multi-Figure Selection
Description: As a user, I want to select multiple figures at a time using CTRL + Left Click and move them together, so that I can easily reposition groups of elements within my SVG projects without having to move them individually.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Figure grouping management
Description: This feature allows users to group multiple figures together, manipulate these groups as single entities, and manage group properties such as creation, movement, and dissolution. This functionality enhances the user's ability to organize and manipulate complex designs efficiently.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Load SVG file
Description: This functionality should allow users to import SVG files. If the file does not adhere to the SVG format or contains properties not managed by our editor, an error message should be displayed.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Creating and selecting figure groups
Description: As a user, I want to group selected figures using a contextual menu so that I can easily manage and manipulate related figures as a single entity.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Moving figure groups
Description: As a user, I want to move a group of figures collectively with simple drag-and-drop actions so that I can efficiently reposition multiple related elements in my design.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Restriction on group nesting and membership
Description: As a user, I need to ensure that each figure can only belong to one group and groups cannot be nested, so that the structure of my SVG file remains simple and manageable.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Dissolving figure groups
Description: As a user, I want the ability to dissolve a group of figures, returning them to individual elements, so that I can reorganize my design or adjust groupings as my project evolves.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Load SVG file
Description: As a user, I want to be able to load SVG files into the application so that I can edit them.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Save SVG file
Description: As a user, I want to be able to save images created with the application in SVG format so that I can use them later.
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Create a circle
Description: As a user, i want to be able to create a circle to the working file using both mouse and keyboard.
Author: GARCÍA PLAZA, JORGE

Title: Add CI for tests and SonarQube
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Drawing Polyline and Polygon with mouse does not create straight lines
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Fix bugs in polygons creation
Description:
'- Polygons: Polygons are made of straight lines, and the shape is "closed" (it automatically connects the last point with the first).
So the fix will consist in:
- For the mouse version, add the functionality of closing the polygons (different click or some other way).
- In the keyboard mode, maybe just put predifined polygons, and the user may select only the the number of sides (maybe also the size ?).
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Fix bug in shapes out of limits
Description:
A shape can be created and moved outside the image limits. Change to restrict shape creation and movement within the bounds of the image.

![image](/uploads/d3790fb83082f98af032da223c724853/image.png)
Author: SERRANO ARRESE, JULIA

Title: Limited Support for Direct Style Attributes in SVG Import
Description:
The current implementation can successfully import SVG elements like the following, where style attributes are defined within a style attribute:

```xml
<rect x="80" y="60" width="250" height="250" rx="20"
      style="fill:#ff0000; stroke:#000000; stroke-width:2px;" />
```

However, it fails to import SVG elements where style attributes are defined directly within the element tags, such as:

```xml
<rect x="13" y="14" width="500" height="200" rx="50" ry="100"
      fill="none" stroke="blue" stroke-width="10" />
```
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Undo functionality for shape creations
Description: As a user, I want to be able to undo shape creations so that I can remove efficiently my last creations.
Author: CAI, XILA

Title: Undo functionality for background color changes
Description: As a user, I want to be able to undo my background color changes so that I can revert to my previous background color.
Author: CAI, XILA
